bibl.title: Hellenica. Selected Papers on Greek Literature and Thought. Volume III. Philosophy, Music and Metre, Literary Byways, Varia.
bibl.note: Reproduction de 33 contributions (1967-2010) et 1 inédit. - Pp. 485-489: Obiter Dicta [choix de citations de M.L.W.]; - 490-498: Supplementary list of publications not included in the present volume and not included or listed in volumes I-II; - 510-513: Index of publications reprinted or excerpted in Hellenica I-III.
bibl.seg: Martin L. West, Hellenica. Selected Papers on Greek Literature and Thought. Volume III. Philosophy, Music and Metre, Literary Byways, Varia.
Oxford - New York, Oxford University Press, 2013, 8°, xiv-513 pp. ISBN 978-0-19-960503-3. £110.

Reproduction de 33 contributions (1967-2010) et 1 inédit. - Pp. 485-489: Obiter Dicta [choix de citations de M.L.W.]; - 490-498: Supplementary list of publications not included in the present volume and not included or listed in volumes I-II; - 510-513: Index of publications reprinted or excerpted in Hellenica I-III.
